dc:title: Day After Day - September 1935
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes the working conditions at a power plant and the indignity "clients" experience at the Welfare department.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 292 1935-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
